Election Commission of Malaysia (SPR), Tindak Malaysia (2023), The Star GE14, PKR, Pilihan Raya Demokrasi Malaysia by Ab. Rashid Ab. Rahman & G. Manimaran (2021), Florczyk A.J., Corbane C., Ehrlich D., Freire S., Kemper T., Maffenini L., Melchiorri M., Pesaresi M., Politis P., Schiavina, M., Sabo F., Zanchetta L., GHSL Data Package 2019, EUR 29788 EN, Publications Office of the European Union, Luxembourg, 2019, ISBN 978-92-76-13186-1, doi:10.2760/290498, JRC 117104
All the percentages for electoral demographics are calculated by Tindak Malaysia.
Field Description
Composite between Parliamentary Code and DUN Code (Unique Identifier)
State Name
Parliamentary Constituency Code (2018 - Present at Created Date). For Sabah, it is based on constituencies formed after 2003 redelineation
Parliamentary Constituency Name (2018 - Present at Created Date). For Sabah, it is based on constituencies formed after 2003 redelineation
State Constituency (DUN) Code (2018 - present at the Created Date). For Sabah, it is based on constituencies formed after 2003 redelineation
State Constituency (DUN) Name (2018 - present at the created Date). For Sabah, it is based on constituencies formed after 2003 redelineation
Total Elector count using the 14th General Election Roll
Proportion of Malay Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of Chinese Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of Indians Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of Bumiputera Sabah Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of Bumiputera Sarawak Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of Orang Asli Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of Others Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of Muslim Bumiputera Electors for the State Constituency (%) (only for Sabah)
Proportion of Non Muslim Bumiputera Electors for the State Constituency (%) (only for Sabah)
Proportion of Electors - Ordinary Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of Electors - Absent Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of Electors - Police Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of Electors - Military Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of 21-29 Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of 30-39 Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of 40-49 Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of 50-59 Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of 60-69 Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of 70-79 Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of 80-89 Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of 90 and Above Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of Male Electors for the State Constituency (%)
Proportion of Female Electors for the State Constituency (%)
State Constituency urbanisation classification
